TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

summary.span: 从 继承的 对象的集合。

span.span: Collection of objects that inherits from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列映射定义数据源和目标表之间的映射。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定义映射 — 即集合为空 — 的列映射隐式基于序号位置。If mappings are not defined—that is, the collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 为实现此目的，必须匹配源和目标架构。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果未显示，引发。If they do not, an is thrown. 如果集合不为空、 不是每个数据源中存在的列必须进行指定。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 将忽略那些未映射的集合。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 您可以通过名称或序号引用源和目标列。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 您可以按名称和相同的映射集合中的第几列引用混合使用。You can mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 添加到为对象来创建用于大容量复制的列映射。 are added to the for the object to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将新 添加到 中。

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在集合中的映射必须统一： 所有整数/整数对，所有字符串/字符串对、 所有整数/字符串对或所有字符串/整数对。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果你尝试添加其他人已在集合中，不同的映射引发。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制使用源和目标列的序号位置的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy using the ordinal position of the source and destination columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在集合中的映射必须统一： 所有整数/整数对，所有字符串/字符串对、 所有整数/字符串对或所有字符串/整数对。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果你尝试添加其他人已在集合中，不同的映射引发。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 以下示例数据大容量复制中的源表**AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的目标表的示例数据库。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与匹配的源中的列数，但不匹配的列名称和序号位置。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 该代码会创建通过指定列名称的对象。The code creates a object by specifying the column names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

span.span: Clears the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时使用单个方法最常用于实例来处理多个大容量复制操作。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果创建一个大容量复制操作的列映射，则必须清除后方法，然后再处理下一步的大容量复制。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must clear the after the method and before processing the next bulk copy. 执行多个大容量复制使用的相同实例通常会从性能角度来看比使用单独的更高效为每个操作。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 以下示例执行两个大容量复制操作。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一个操作将销售订单表头信息，而第二个则将销售订单详细信息。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 尽管不是绝对必要在此示例中 （因为匹配的源和目标列的序号位置），该示例定义了每个大容量复制操作的列映射。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 执行第一个大容量复制并在下一步的大容量复制的列映射定义后，必须使用方法。The method must be used after the first bulk copy is performed and before the next bulk copy's column mappings are defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时使用单个方法最常用于实例来处理多个大容量复制操作。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果创建一个大容量复制操作的列映射，则必须删除不再适用后的映射方法是调用，然后才能定义用于下一步的大容量复制的映射。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 可以通过清除整个集合方法或使用单独的删除映射方法或方法。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 执行多个大容量复制使用的相同实例通常会从性能角度来看比使用单独的更高效为每个操作。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 以下示例执行两个大容量复制操作。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一个操作将销售订单表头信息，而第二个则将销售订单详细信息。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 尽管不是绝对必要在此示例中 （因为匹配的源和目标列的序号位置），该示例定义了每个大容量复制操作的列映射。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 这两个大容量复制包含的映射**SalesOrderID**，因此而不是清除之间大容量复制操作，示例会删除整个集合除外的所有映射**SalesOrderID**映射，然后添加第二个大容量复制操作的相应映射。Both bulk copies include a mapping for the **SalesOrderID**, so rather than clearing the entire collection between bulk copy operations, the example removes all mappings except for the **SalesOrderID** mapping and then adds the appropriate mappings for the second bulk copy operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 要从集合中移除的 对象的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the object to be removed from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定索引处的映射。

span.span: Removes the mapping at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时使用单个方法最常用于实例来处理多个大容量复制操作。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果创建一个大容量复制操作的列映射，则必须删除不再适用后的映射方法是调用，然后才能定义用于下一步的大容量复制的映射。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 可以通过清除整个集合方法或使用单独的删除映射方法或方法。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 执行多个大容量复制使用的相同实例通常会从性能角度来看比使用单独的更高效为每个操作。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 以下示例执行两个大容量复制操作。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一个操作将销售订单表头信息，而第二个则将销售订单详细信息。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 尽管不是绝对必要在此示例中 （因为匹配的源和目标列的序号位置），该示例定义了每个大容量复制操作的列映射。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 这两个大容量复制包含的映射**SalesOrderID**，因此而不是清除之间大容量复制操作，示例会删除整个集合除外的所有映射**SalesOrderID**映射，然后添加第二个大容量复制操作的相应映射。Both bulk copies include a mapping for the **SalesOrderID**, so rather than clearing the entire collection between bulk copy operations, the example removes all mappings except for the **SalesOrderID** mapping and then adds the appropriate mappings for the second bulk copy operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/VB/source.vb#1)]
